original_title: 100 Jahre Adolf Hitler – Die letzte Stunde im Führerbunker
overview: On 30 April 1945, dictator Adolf Hitler, his wife Eva Braun, and prominent members of the Third Reich live out their final hour in the Führerbunker.
tagline: One light, One day, One movie!
title: 100 Years of Adolf Hitler – The Last Hour in the Führerbunker
